message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not sure I can go all the way up to $14,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $12,500 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm happy to come down to $13,500. This price reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
